problem.markdown:
1. The output of a gate is HIGH if and only if all its inputs are LOW. It is true for (x) NOR () NAND () XOR () ALL
2) The output if a 2-input gate is 1 if and only if its input are unequal it is true for () OR () NOR (x) XOR () XNOR
3) The output of gate is low when at least one of the input is high () OR (x) NOR () AND () NAND
4) The output of the gate is high only if all its inputs are high. It is true for () NOR () XOR (x) AND () NAND
5) The output of the a gate is low if and only if all the inputs are low. It is true for (x) OR () XOR () AND () NAND
problem.p: 1. The output of a gate is HIGH if and only if all its inputs are LOW. It is true for
2) The output if a 2-input gate is 1 if and only if its input are unequal it is true for
3) The output of gate is low when at least one of the input is high
4) The output of the gate is high only if all its inputs are high. It is true for
5) The output of the a gate is low if and only if all the inputs are low. It is true for
